title: Therapeutic Services
subtitle: Comprehensive mental health services designed to support your journey toward healing and growth.

individual.title: Individual Therapy
individual.description: One-on-one sessions tailored to your specific needs and goals.

couples.title: Couples Therapy
couples.description: Strengthen relationships and improve communication patterns.

trauma.title: Trauma Recovery
trauma.description: Specialized treatment for trauma, PTSD, and difficult life experiences.

stress.title: Stress Management
stress.description: Learn effective coping strategies for work and life pressures.

approach.title: My Therapeutic Approach
approach.description: I integrate various evidence-based approaches tailored to each client's unique needs. My practice emphasizes creating a safe, non-judgmental space where you can explore your thoughts and feelings while developing practical skills for lasting change.

collaborative.title: Collaborative Partnership
collaborative.description: We work together as partners in your healing journey.

strength.title: Strength-Based Focus
strength.description: Building on your existing strengths and resilience.

cultural.title: Culturally Responsive
cultural.description: Honoring your unique background and experiences.
